text: Isomerida cinctiventris is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1885. It is known from Panama and Costa Rica.BioLib.cz - Isomerida cinctiventris. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Isomerida cinctiventris
